title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken, and almost everyone is crazed fighting for the necessities of life. Within this world exist two rebels on the run who just might be able to restore order. There's Max, a man of action and a man of few words, who seeks peace of mind following the loss of his wife and child in the aftermath of the chaos. And Furiosa, a woman of action and a woman who believes her path to survival may be achieved if she can make it across the desert back to her childhood homeland.
awards: Top Rated Movies #206 | Won 6 Oscars. Another 239 wins & 231 nominations.
writers: George Miller, Brendan McCarthy, Nick Lathouris
stars: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Zoë Kravitz
companies: Warner Bros., Village Roadshow Pictures, Kennedy Miller Productions

tagline: THE FUTURE BELONGS TO THE MAD (all-caps One Sheet)

similars.title: Logan
similars.plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.
similars.stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen

similars.title: The Dark Knight Rises
similars.plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
similars.stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway

similars.title: Django Unchained
similars.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.
similars.stars: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio

similars.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
similars.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
similars.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie

similars.title: Mad Max
similars.plot: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.
similars.stars: Mel Gibson, Joanne Samuel, Hugh Keays-Byrne

similars.title: Inglourious Basterds
similars.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
similars.stars: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth

similars.title: Jurassic Park
similars.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
similars.stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

similars.title: V for Vendetta
similars.plot: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.
similars.stars: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves

similars.title: Batman Begins
similars.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
similars.stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe

similars.title: Inception
similars.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
similars.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page

similars.title: Gladiator
similars.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
similars.stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

similars.title: The Matrix
similars.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
similars.stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
